path: artifacts/Zatcoin Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

project_path.Zatcoin: contracts/Zatcoin Full Smart Contract Security Audit/Zatcoin

findings.title: Out of gas in S03_includeInReward() function
findings.description: The function S03_includeInReward() uses a loop to find and remove addresses from the _excluded list, which may lead to an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the excluded addresses list is too long.
